alert.note: Alert for McPherson; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 9:32PM CDT until September 17 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern McPherson County in central Kansas... Southern Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 932 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marquette, or 10 miles west of Lindsborg, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lindsborg, Marquette, Assaria, Gypsum, Falun, Bridgeport and Roxbury. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 65 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
